metadata.name: Exchange PowerShell Snap-Ins Usage
metadata.comment: Detects adding and using Exchange PowerShell snap-ins to export mailbox data. As seen used by HAFNIUM and APT27

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('powershell\.exe', 'pwsh\.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add-pssnapin')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('microsoft.exchange.powershell.snapin')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('microsoft.exchange.management.powershell.snapin'))) AND NOT (lower(process.parent_process.name) = lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\msiexec.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('$exserver=get-exchangeserver ([environment]::machinename) -errorvariable exerr 2> $null'))))

output.summary: Detects adding and using Exchange PowerShell snap-ins to export mailbox data. As seen used by HAFNIUM and APT27
